name: CarX Drift Racing Online: Midnight
summary: CarX Drift Racing Online: Midnight is a DLC for the simulator game CarX Drift Racing Online, featuring virtual drift racing on mountain roads and narrow city streets. It's quite challenging for both rookie and experienced racers. Front lights cutting through darkness are your only companion on mountain roads and narrow city streets. Discover drifting again and enjoy new atmospheres for your favorite locations at night with CarX Drift Racing Online: Midnight.
